jcr:content.jcr:title: Troop Cookie Manager Training - Girl Scout Center

data.details:
The classroom training is designed for Troop Cookie Managers (TCM). If you have never had TCM training before, join us for this practical, worthwhile and motivating training! TIP: Register early to get into the training on the date, time and location most convenient to you.

All Troop Cookie Managers are required to take training annually, be a currently registered adult member of Girl Scouts and have an approved volunteer application and criminal background check.

Registration closes Jan. 1, 2015 at 11:59 p.m.
data.srchdisp: The classroom training is designed for Troop Cookie Managers (TCM). If you have never had TCM training before, join us for this practical, worthwhile and motivating training!
